item.title: Personal Git Cheat Sheet
item.description: Git commands For sure there are a lot of additional git commands, weird configurations, or more robust cheat sheets everywhere but this is my own compilation, these are most of the commands I’ve required on a daily basis organized and with a description easy to understand for future reference. For different command options, I’ll use ::: to avoid confusion with semicolons or other characters. Configuration commands Type Description Command Config Configure vscode as default git editor $ git config --global core.
